typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{$dtid} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		EMT as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		Status as string,
		ErrorCode as string,
		TotalNum as string,
		Category as string,
		EventTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> srccncstatus
source(output(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		Tag_Modbus_Humidity as string,
		Tag_D2_Blue as string,
		Tag_Modbus_Temperature as string,
		Tag_D1_Analog as string,
		Tag_Modbus_CO2 as string,
		Tag_D0_Digital as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> IoTHubData
